channel.title: Stuck in RA room issue in q3dm7
channel.description: We've still got to fix this annoying bug with the bot AI in q3dm7. @zturtleman figured out it was a LTG issue. If we can figure out where `BotChooseLTGItem()` slips up, then we could possibly figure out a fix.
